verses.name: Jeremiah 17:13
verses.text: O Lord, the hope of Israel, all that forsake thee shall be ashamed, and they that depart from me shall be written in the earth, because they have forsaken the Lord, the fountain of living waters.

verses.name: Jeremiah 17:14
verses.text: Heal me, O Lord, and I shall be healed; save me, and I shall be saved: for thou art my praise.

verses.name: Jeremiah 17:15
verses.text: Behold, they say unto me, Where is the word of the Lord? let it come now.
